Privacy Policy

Last Updated: 23/01/2023

1. Information We Collect

1.1 Personal Information: We do not collect personally identifiable information unless explicitly provided by the user for specific features.

1.2 Usage Information: We collect information about how you use GB Chat App, including log data, device information, and usage patterns.

1.3 Messages and Media: GB Chat App securely processes and stores messages and media files to enable core functionality. We do not have access to the content of your messages, as they are end-to-end encrypted.

2. How We Use Your Information

2.1 Core Functionality: We use the information we collect to provide you with the core functionality of GB Chat App, including delivering messages, media, and notifications.

2.2 Improving User Experience: We use aggregated and anonymized data for analytical purposes to enhance and optimize the user experience.

2.3 Security: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction.

3. Data Sharing and Disclosure

3.1 Service Providers: We may share your information with third-party service providers that assist us in delivering and improving GB Chat App.

3.2 Legal Compliance: We may disclose your information if required by law, regulation, legal process, or governmental request.

3.3 Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be part of the transferred assets.

4. Your Choices

4.1 Opting Out: You can opt out of certain data collection features within GB Chat App, but it may affect the functionality of certain features.

4.2 Account Deletion: You can delete your GB Chat App account at any time, resulting in the deletion of your associated data.

5. Updates to this Privacy Policy

5.1 Update Statement: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and your continued use of GB Chat App after the update constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [contact@email.com].
